name: Piercing Gleam
effects: Physical damage (1.4x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce DEF by 40% for 3 turns to one enemy

一閃突破

desc_short: Damage and reduce DEF for one enemy
Dégâts et réduit la DEF d'un ennemi

desc_long: Deals damage to one enemy, and reduces their DEF.
攻擊1名敵人並降低其防禦的數值。
Inflige des dégâts et réduit la DEF d'un ennemi.
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu und reduziert seine ABW.
